author: Rico T
title: Room okay, great location
text:
Why one star?
2 weeks have gone since I left NYC and here I am checking my account only to be surprised that they charged me another $250++
I have now been charged on my card a total of $850++ for a 3 night stay considering that it's should just be $150++ a night at most.
The hotel itself is in a block right next to Times Square. Perfect location. Rooms are okay, clean and with comfy beds. One tiny elevator, I can't imagine how it is on busy days but happy to be lucky to be there when it wasn't busy.
I give this hotel one star rate because money is important and if they charge you irresponsibly, that's just not acceptable.
I do not recommend any hotel that robs you.
Be warned and be careful using your card when booking/staying at this hotel.
